# The `MachineLoopAnalysis` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Analysis pass that exposes the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloopinfo">MachineLoopInfo</a></code> for a machine function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Analysis pass that exposes the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloopinfo">MachineLoopInfo</a></code> for a machine function.
